Duration.Name: Duration: Countdown
Duration.Hint: Time in seconds for the countdown (0-10). Set to 0 to disable.

BlazeMessage.Name: Text: Blaze of Glory
BlazeMessage.Hint: The message displayed in chat when Blaze of Glory is chosen.

ShowProbabilities.Name: Show Probabilities
ShowProbabilities.Hint: If checked, displays the percentage chance of outcomes below each death option.

Background.Name: Image: Main Screen
Background.Hint: The background image displayed behind the three choices.

Blaze.Name: Image: Blaze of Glory
Blaze.Hint: The image shown when a player selects 'Blaze of Glory'.

AvoidScar.Name: Image: Avoid Death (Scar)
AvoidScar.Hint: The image shown when Avoid Death roll fails (Roll <= Level).

AvoidSafe.Name: Image: Avoid Death (Safe)
AvoidSafe.Hint: The image shown when Avoid Death roll succeeds (Roll > Level).

Hope.Name: Image: Result Hope
Hope.Hint: The image displayed when the 'Risk it All' roll results in Hope.

Fear.Name: Image: Result Fear
Fear.Hint: The image displayed when the 'Risk it All' roll results in Fear.

Critical.Name: Image: Result Critical
Critical.Hint: The image displayed when the 'Risk it All' roll is a Critical Success.

SoundSuspense.Name: Sound: Countdown
SoundSuspense.Hint: The ticking/suspense sound played during the 6-second countdown.

SoundBlaze.Name: Sound: Blaze of Glory
SoundBlaze.Hint: The sound effect played when 'Blaze of Glory' is selected.

SoundAvoidSafe.Name: Sound: Avoid Death (Safe)
SoundAvoidSafe.Hint: Sound played when Avoid Death succeeds.

SoundAvoidScar.Name: Sound: Avoid Death (Scar)
SoundAvoidScar.Hint: Sound played when Avoid Death fails (Scar).

SoundHope.Name: Sound: Result Hope
SoundHope.Hint: Sound played on a Hope result.

SoundFear.Name: Sound: Result Fear
SoundFear.Hint: Sound played on a Fear result.

SoundCritical.Name: Sound: Result Critical
SoundCritical.Hint: Sound played on a Critical result.

Risk.Speaker: Risk It All
Risk.HopeDesc: You stand, clearing Hit Points and/or Stress equal to the Hope Die value.
Risk.CriticalDesc: You stand and clear all Hit Points and Stress.
